f3PortMirrorMIB.name: f3PortMirrorMIB

revisions.description: Notes from release 201410130000Z, (1) Added table: - f3MonitorPortStatsTable Notes from release 201409300000Z, (1) Removed tables: - f3MirrorFilterProfileAddedEntriesTable, - f3MonitorPortStatsTable Notes from release 201407310000Z, (1) New table: - f3MirrorFilterProfileAddedEntriesTable. Notes from release 201407210000Z, (1) New textual conventions: - MirroredFramesAction, - PortMirrorStatsAction. (2) New column in f3MonitorPortStatsTable: - f3MonitorPortStatsAction. (3) New tables: - f3MirrorFilterProfileTable, - f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryTable, - f3MirrorFilterTable, - f3MirrorSessionStatsTable. Notes from release 201405190000Z, (1) New column in f3MirrorSessionTable: - f3MirrorSessionMirrRsrcPort. Notes from release 201310210000Z, (1) Added table: - f3PortMirrorAccPortExtTable. Notes from release 201310140000Z, (1) MIB version ready for release FSP150CC 6.1.CC.

f3PortMirrorMIB.contactinfo: Marek Romaniuk ADVA Optical Networking, Inc. Tel: +48 58 7716 414 E-mail: mromaniuk@advaoptical.com Postal: ul. Slaska 35/37 81-310 Gdynia, Poland
f3PortMirrorMIB.description: This module defines the Port Mirror MIB definitions used by the F3 (FSP150CM/CC) product lines. Copyright (C) ADVA Optical Networking.

MirroredFramesAction.name: MirroredFramesAction
MirroredFramesAction.description: User action initiated on Mirror Filter Profile and Mirror Filter Profile Entry.

PortMirrorStatsAction.name: PortMirrorStatsAction
PortMirrorStatsAction.description: User action initiated on Mirror Session Stats.

f3MirrorSessionTable.name: f3MirrorSessionTable
f3MirrorSessionTable.description: A list of entries corresponding to Mirror Session instance for configuration purposes.

f3MirrorSessionEntry.name: f3MirrorSessionEntry
f3MirrorSessionEntry.description: A conceptual row in the f3MirrorSessionTable.

f3MirrorSessionIndex.name: f3MirrorSessionIndex
f3MirrorSessionIndex.description: An integer index value used to uniquely identify this Port Mirror Session within Network Element.

f3MirrorSessionSourcePort.name: f3MirrorSessionSourcePort
f3MirrorSessionSourcePort.description: Pointer to a Port instance which represents Monitored Port with the Mirror Session. The pointer must be set to cmEthernetAccPortIndex or cmEthernetNetPortIndex instance.

f3MirrorSessionMonitorPort.name: f3MirrorSessionMonitorPort
f3MirrorSessionMonitorPort.description: Pointer to a Port instance which represents Port where mirrored frames are transmitted. The pointer must be set to cmEthernetAccPortIndex instance.

f3MirrorSessionSourcePortDir.name: f3MirrorSessionSourcePortDir
f3MirrorSessionSourcePortDir.description: Indicates the SourcePort traffic flow direction to be copied for transmit on the MonitorPort: 1) INGRESS: frames received by the SourcePort are mirrored to the transmit direction of the MonitorPort. 2) EGRESS: frames to be transmitted by the SourcePort are mirrored to the transmit direction of the MonitorPort.

f3MirrorSessionTruncationCtrl.name: f3MirrorSessionTruncationCtrl
f3MirrorSessionTruncationCtrl.description: Indicates if frame is truncated to TruncationLength before being transmitted on the Monitor Port: 1) DISABLED: the frame is transmitted on the MonitorPort without length modification. 2) ENABLED: the frame is truncated to TruncationLength before being transmitted on the MonitorPort. FCS is relaculated based on the truncated length.

f3MirrorSessionTruncationLength.name: f3MirrorSessionTruncationLength
f3MirrorSessionTruncationLength.description: Length of mirrored frame truncation when TruncationControl is ENABLED. Possible values are 64 bytes to 1500 bytes. All mirrored frames transmitted on the MonitorPort will have a frame length equal to the TruncationLength where frame length is from first byte of the Destination MAC Address to last bye of the newly calculated FCS.

f3MirrorSessionTimestampControl.name: f3MirrorSessionTimestampControl
f3MirrorSessionTimestampControl.description: Indicates if timestamp information is added to a frame transmitted on the MonitorPort: 1) DISABLED: no timestamp information is added to a frame transmitted on the MonitorPort. 2) ENABLED: a timestamp is added to the frame frame in the 10 bytes before the FCS: - For mirrored frames ingressing the SourcePort, the timestamp is the TOD when the frame was received on the SourcePort. - For mirrored frames egressing the SourcePort, the timestamp is the TOD when the frames was transmitted on the SourcePort.

f3MirrorSessionStorageType.name: f3MirrorSessionStorageType
f3MirrorSessionStorageType.description: The type of storage configured for this entry.

f3MirrorSessionRowStatus.name: f3MirrorSessionRowStatus
f3MirrorSessionRowStatus.description: The status of this row. An entry MUST NOT exist in the active state unless all objects in the entry have an appropriate value, as described in the description clause for each writable object. The values of f3MirrorSessionRowStatus supported are createAndGo(4) and destroy(6). All mandatory attributes must be specified in a single SNMP SET request with neRowStatus value as createAndGo(4). Upon successful row creation, this object has a value of active(1). The f3MirrorSessionRowStatus object may be modified if the associated instance of this object is equal to active(1).

f3MirrorSessionMirrRsrcPort.name: f3MirrorSessionMirrRsrcPort
f3MirrorSessionMirrRsrcPort.description: Pointer to a Port instance which represents Mirror Resource Port. The pointer must be set to cmEthernetAccPortIndex instance.

f3MirrorSessionFilterProfile.name: f3MirrorSessionFilterProfile
f3MirrorSessionFilterProfile.description: Pointer to a Mirror Filter Profile instance which represents Mirror Session Filter Profile. The pointer must be set to f3MirrorFilterProfileName instance.

f3PortMirrorAccPortExtTable.name: f3PortMirrorAccPortExtTable
f3PortMirrorAccPortExtTable.description: A list of entries corresponding to Ethernet Access Port Facilities for Port Mirror configuration purposes.

f3PortMirrorAccPortExtEntry.name: f3PortMirrorAccPortExtEntry
f3PortMirrorAccPortExtEntry.description: A conceptual row in the f3PortMirrorAccPortExtTable.

f3PortMirrorAccPortExtMonitorEnabled.name: f3PortMirrorAccPortExtMonitorEnabled
f3PortMirrorAccPortExtMonitorEnabled.description: This object allows to Enable/Disable Monitor Mode on Port.

f3PortMirrorAccPortExtBufferSize.name: f3PortMirrorAccPortExtBufferSize
f3PortMirrorAccPortExtBufferSize.description: Applicable when port is in Monitor Mode.

f3PortMirrorAccPortExtMirrRsrcEnabled.name: f3PortMirrorAccPortExtMirrRsrcEnabled
f3PortMirrorAccPortExtMirrRsrcEnabled.description: This object allows to Enable/Disable Mirror Resource on Port.

f3MonitorPortStatsTable.name: f3MonitorPortStatsTable
f3MonitorPortStatsTable.description: A list of entries corresponding to the Access Port related Monitor Port Statistics.

f3MonitorPortStatsEntry.name: f3MonitorPortStatsEntry
f3MonitorPortStatsEntry.description: A conceptual row in the f3MonitorPortStatsTable.

f3MonitorPortStatsIndex.name: f3MonitorPortStatsIndex
f3MonitorPortStatsIndex.description: An integer index value used to uniquely identify this Ethernet Access Port (Monitor Port) statistics

f3MirrorSessionStatsTable.name: f3MirrorSessionStatsTable
f3MirrorSessionStatsTable.description: A list of entries corresponding to the Mirror Session Statistics.

f3MirrorSessionStatsEntry.name: f3MirrorSessionStatsEntry
f3MirrorSessionStatsEntry.description: A conceptual row in the f3MirrorSessionStatsTable.

f3MirrorSessionStatsIndex.name: f3MirrorSessionStatsIndex
f3MirrorSessionStatsIndex.description: An integer index value used to uniquely identify this Mirror Session statistics

f3MirrorSessionStatsMirrFilterFrameDisca.name: f3MirrorSessionStatsMirrFilterFrameDiscard
f3MirrorSessionStatsMirrFilterFrameDisca.description: The number of frames dropped due to a filter having a DENY action.

f3MirrorSessionStatsAction.name: f3MirrorSessionStatsAction
f3MirrorSessionStatsAction.description: User action performed on Monitor Port Stats.

f3MirrorFilterProfileTable.name: f3MirrorFilterProfileTable
f3MirrorFilterProfileTable.description: A list of entries corresponding to Mirror Filter Profile instance for configuration purposes.

f3MirrorFilterProfileEntry.name: f3MirrorFilterProfileEntry
f3MirrorFilterProfileEntry.description: A conceptual row in the f3MirrorFilterProfileTable.

f3MirrorFilterProfileIndex.name: f3MirrorFilterProfileIndex
f3MirrorFilterProfileIndex.description: An integer index value used to uniquely identify this Mirror Filter Profile within Network Element.

f3MirrorFilterProfileDefaultAction.name: f3MirrorFilterProfileDefaultAction
f3MirrorFilterProfileDefaultAction.description: Mirror Filter Profile Action for a mirrored frame that does not match any filter entry for the profile

f3MirrorFilterProfileStorageType.name: f3MirrorFilterProfileStorageType
f3MirrorFilterProfileStorageType.description: The type of storage configured for this entry.

f3MirrorFilterProfileRowStatus.name: f3MirrorFilterProfileRowStatus
f3MirrorFilterProfileRowStatus.description: The status of this row. An entry MUST NOT exist in the active state unless all objects in the entry have an appropriate value, as described in the description clause for each writable object. The values of f3MirrorFilterProfileRowStatus supported are createAndGo(4) and destroy(6). All mandatory attributes must be specified in a single SNMP SET request with neRowStatus value as createAndGo(4). Upon successful row creation, this object has a value of active(1). The f3MirrorFilterProfileRowStatus object may be modified if the associated instance of this object is equal to active(1).

f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryTable.name: f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryTable
f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryTable.description: A list of entries corresponding to Mirror Filter Profile Entry instance for configuration purposes.

f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryEntry.name: f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryEntry
f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryEntry.description: A conceptual row in the f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryTable.

f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryIndex.name: f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryIndex
f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryIndex.description: An integer index value used to uniquely identify this Mirror Filter Profile Entry within Mirror Filter Profile.

f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryFilter.name: f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryFilter
f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryFilter.description: Pointer to a Mirror Filter. The pointer must be set to f3MirrorFilterName.

f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryPriority.name: f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryPriority
f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryPriority.description: Execution order for this Filter Entry within the Profile

f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryAction.name: f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryAction
f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryAction.description: User action performed on this Mirror Filter Profile Entryinstance: - ACCEPT: a Mirrored Frame that matches this filter entry is transmitted on the Monitor Port - DENY: a Mirrored Frame that matches this filter entry is discarded and not transmitted on the Monitor Port

f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryStorageType.name: f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryStorageType
f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryStorageType.description: The type of storage configured for this entry.

f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryRowStatus.name: f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryRowStatus
f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryRowStatus.description: The status of this row. An entry MUST NOT exist in the active state unless all objects in the entry have an appropriate value, as described in the description clause for each writable object. The values of f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryRowStatus supported are createAndGo(4) and destroy(6). All mandatory attributes must be specified in a single SNMP SET request with neRowStatus value as createAndGo(4). Upon successful row creation, this object has a value of active(1). The f3MirrorFilterProfileEntryRowStatus object may be modified if the associated instance of this object is equal to active(1).

f3MirrorFilterTable.name: f3MirrorFilterTable
f3MirrorFilterTable.description: A list of entries corresponding to Mirror Filter instance for configuration purposes.

f3MirrorFilterEntry.name: f3MirrorFilterEntry
f3MirrorFilterEntry.description: A conceptual row in the f3MirrorFilterTable.

f3MirrorFilterIndex.name: f3MirrorFilterIndex
f3MirrorFilterIndex.description: An integer index value used to uniquely identify this Mirror Filter within Network Element.

f3MirrorFilterL2OuterVIDCtrlEnabled.name: f3MirrorFilterL2OuterVIDCtrlEnabled
f3MirrorFilterL2OuterVIDCtrlEnabled.description: Object used to determine if l2FilterOuterVIDLow/High values will be applied as frame match criteria

f3MirrorFilterL2OuterVIDLow.name: f3MirrorFilterL2OuterVIDLow
f3MirrorFilterL2OuterVIDLow.description: A Outer tag VID value to be applied as a frame match criteria to the Outer Tag of the frame when l2FilterOuterVIDControl is ENABLED.

f3MirrorFilterL2OuterVIDHigh.name: f3MirrorFilterL2OuterVIDHigh
f3MirrorFilterL2OuterVIDHigh.description: A Outer tag VID value to be applied as a frame match criteria to the Outer Tag of the frame when l2FilterOuterVIDControl is ENABLED.

f3MirrorFilterL2OuterPrioCtrlEnabled.name: f3MirrorFilterL2OuterPrioCtrlEnabled
f3MirrorFilterL2OuterPrioCtrlEnabled.description: Object used to determine if l2FilterOuterPrioLow/High values will be applied as frame match criteria

f3MirrorFilterL2OuterPrioLow.name: f3MirrorFilterL2OuterPrioLow
f3MirrorFilterL2OuterPrioLow.description: A Outer tag Prio value to be applied as a frame match criteria to the Outer Tag of the frame when l2FilterOuterPrioControl is ENABLED.

f3MirrorFilterL2OuterPrioHigh.name: f3MirrorFilterL2OuterPrioHigh
f3MirrorFilterL2OuterPrioHigh.description: A Outer tag Prio value to be applied as a frame match criteria to the Outer Tag of the frame when l2FilterOuterPrioControl is ENABLED.

f3MirrorFilterL3IPv4DstAddrCtrlEnabled.name: f3MirrorFilterL3IPv4DstAddrCtrlEnabled
f3MirrorFilterL3IPv4DstAddrCtrlEnabled.description: Object used to determine if l3FilterIPv4DstAddr/DstAddrMask values will be applied as frame match criteria

f3MirrorFilterL3IPv4DstAddr.name: f3MirrorFilterL3IPv4DstAddr
f3MirrorFilterL3IPv4DstAddr.description: A IPv4 Address value to be applied as a frame match criteria to the IPv4 Destination Address of the frame when l3FilterIPv4DstAddrControl is ENABLED.

f3MirrorFilterL3IPv4DstAddrMask.name: f3MirrorFilterL3IPv4DstAddrMask
f3MirrorFilterL3IPv4DstAddrMask.description: A IPv4 Address Mask value to be applied as a frame match criteria to the IPv4 Destination Address of the frame when l3FilterIPv4DstAddrControl is ENABLED.

f3MirrorFilterL3IPv4SrcAddrCtrlEnabled.name: f3MirrorFilterL3IPv4SrcAddrCtrlEnabled
f3MirrorFilterL3IPv4SrcAddrCtrlEnabled.description: Object used to determine if l3FilterIPv4SrcAddr/SrcAddrMask values will be applied as frame match criteria

f3MirrorFilterL3IPv4SrcAddr.name: f3MirrorFilterL3IPv4SrcAddr
f3MirrorFilterL3IPv4SrcAddr.description: A IPv4 Address value to be applied as a frame match criteria to the IPv4 Source Address of the frame when l3FilterIPv4SrcAddrControl is ENABLED.

f3MirrorFilterL3IPv4SrcAddrMask.name: f3MirrorFilterL3IPv4SrcAddrMask
f3MirrorFilterL3IPv4SrcAddrMask.description: A IPv4 Address Mask value to be applied as a frame match criteria to the IPv4 Source Address of the frame when l3FilterIPv4SrcAddrControl is ENABLED.

f3MirrorFilterStorageType.name: f3MirrorFilterStorageType
f3MirrorFilterStorageType.description: The type of storage configured for this entry.

f3MirrorFilterRowStatus.name: f3MirrorFilterRowStatus
f3MirrorFilterRowStatus.description: The status of this row. An entry MUST NOT exist in the active state unless all objects in the entry have an appropriate value, as described in the description clause for each writable object. The values of f3MirrorFilterRowStatus supported are createAndGo(4) and destroy(6). All mandatory attributes must be specified in a single SNMP SET request with neRowStatus value as createAndGo(4). Upon successful row creation, this object has a value of active(1). The f3MirrorFilterRowStatus object may be modified if the associated instance of this object is equal to active(1).

f3PortMirrorCompliance.name: f3PortMirrorCompliance
f3PortMirrorCompliance.description: Describes the requirements for conformance to the F3-PORTMIRROR-MIB compilance.

f3MirrorSessionGroup.name: f3MirrorSessionGroup
f3MirrorSessionGroup.description: A collection of objects used to manage the Port Mirror Session.

f3PortMirrorAccPortExtGroup.name: f3PortMirrorAccPortExtGroup
f3PortMirrorAccPortExtGroup.description: A collection of objects used to manage the Access Port attributes related with Port Mirror feature.

f3MonitorPortStatsGroup.name: f3MonitorPortStatsGroup
f3MonitorPortStatsGroup.description: A collection of Monitor Port statistic objects.

f3MirrorSessionStatsGroup.name: f3MirrorSessionStatsGroup
f3MirrorSessionStatsGroup.description: A collection of Mirror Session statistic objects.

f3PortMirrorFilterGroup.name: f3PortMirrorFilterGroup
f3PortMirrorFilterGroup.description: A collection of objects used to manage the Port Mirror Session Filter functionality.
